verses.verse: Whither is thy <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H1980>gone<s%>, O thou <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women<s%>? Whither hath thy <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H1245>him<s%>, That we may seek him with thee?

My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to his <S%H1588>garden<s%>, To the <S%H6170>beds<s%> of <S%H1314>spices<s%>, To <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H1588>gardens<s%>, and to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H7799>lilies<s%>.
I am my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>'s, and my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H7462>mine<s%>; He feedeth his flock among the <S%H7799>lilies<s%>,
Thou art <S%H3303>fair<s%>, O my <S%H7474>love<s%>, as <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>, <S%H5000>Comely<s%> as <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H366>Terrible<s%> as an army with <S%H1713>banners<s%>.

Turn <S%H5437>away<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1992>me<s%>, For they have <S%H7292>overcome<s%> <S%H8181>me<s%>. Thy hair is as a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>, That <S%H1570>lie<s%> along the side of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

Thy <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H7353>ewes<s%>, Which are come <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H7367>washing<s%>; Whereof every one hath <S%H8382>twins<s%>, And none is bereaved among <S%H7909>them<s%>.
Thy <S%H7541>temples<s%> are like a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H1157>Behind<s%> thy <S%H6777>veil<s%>.

My <S%H3123>dove<s%>, my <S%H8535>undefiled<s%>, is but <S%H259>one<s%>; She is the only <S%H259>one<s%> of her <S%H517>mother<s%>; She is the <S%H1249>choice<s%> one of her that <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H1323>her<s%>. The daughters <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H833>her<s%>, and called her blessed; <S%H4436>Yea<s%>, the queens and the <S%H6370>concubines<s%>, and they praised <S%H1984>her<s%>.

Who is she that looketh <S%H8259>forth<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning<s%>, <S%H3303>Fair<s%> as the <S%H3842>moon<s%>, <S%H1249>Clear<s%> as the <S%H2535>sun<s%>, <S%H366>Terrible<s%> as an army with <S%H1713>banners<s%>?

I went <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H1594>garden<s%> of <S%H93>nuts<s%>, To <S%H7200>see<s%> the green <S%H3>plants<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, To <S%H7200>see<s%> whether the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H5132>budded<s%>, And the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> were in <S%H5132>flower<s%>.
Before I was <S%H3045>aware<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> me Among the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of my princely <S%H5993>people<s%>.

Return <S%H7725><s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%>, O <S%H7759>Shulammite<s%>; <S%H7725>Return<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%>, that we may <S%H2372>look<s%> upon <S%H2372>thee<s%>. Why will ye look upon the <S%H7759>Shulammite<s%>, As upon the <S%H4246>dance<s%> of <S%H4264>Mahanaim<s%>?
